long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the "NOK Concur Title Generator". (Renamed)

This extension serves as the user interface for the extension's popup window. It is responsible for displaying two sections: "TA/Expense Title" and "Other Expense Title." Each of these sections contains input fields and elements to show the titles generated by the extension. Essentially, it provides the visual interface for users to interact with the extension and view the titles generated for their expenses.

# Release
v1.0.0: Draft version
v2.0.0: 
    1) Add reset button and default button
    2) Add separators for the week number and month
    3) Add functionalities for multiple weeks and months
    4) Modify "Etc" checkbox functionality
    5) Add messages
v2.1.0: 
    1) Applied new policies
    2) Add separators
    3) Add the current week number
    4) Add cities
